reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable and true to size, with flattering ruching that shows off their curves.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Classy and flattering!
items.body: HONEYðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥! This dress is EVERYTHING! It was a last minute purchase for a wedding. It arrived the next day and it is beautiful! Stretchy satin material that's so classy for a special event. It hugs in the right places and camouflages where needed. I didn't have to constantly adjust it when walking standing or sitting. It was light weight but NOT thin. It has an invisible zipper in the back that was very sturdy. The length is perfect and the split is very tasteful. The size chart is correct. I'm 5'9" 199 to 201 and I ordered a XL but I could have worn a Large. If you prefer a tighter fit you may consider going down. The XL was a little big in areas (across my chest but I'm not top heavy). Around my waist the ruching was a little lose. But neither of these are a flaw of the dress. This dress is a show stopper and I was the "It Girl" at the Wedding! Read more
items.author: Alpha Girl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I wear a 2x but I got 3x just in case.. 5'6 bout 240... 44 DDD
items.body: I loved this dress from the moment I tried it on! The satin fabric feels luxurious and smooth, and it has just the right amount of shine without being too flashy. The high waist and ruched detailing are super flattering it hugs in all the right places and gives a gorgeous silhouette. The slit adds a touch of elegance and makes it easy to move and walk comfortably. I wore this for a formal event and got so many compliments! It looks far more expensive than it is and photographs beautifully. The fit was true to size, and the quality really impressed me. Perfect for weddings, galas, or any special occasion. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: T M.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Satin style!
items.body: Buy the dress! I purchased this dress for a wedding I was attending. This dress has great quality fabric not thin at all, comfortable, beautiful style and fit for us curvy girls. The gold color tone was perfect now Iâ€™m definitely gonna purchase in more colors). Read more
items.author: Mojo

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Off color
items.body: Color was a little different but it actually is a beautiful dress! Read more
items.author: Robert H.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy dress
items.body: I got so many compliments on this dress! Fit is true to size and has some stretch. No need for shapewear-the front ruching will hide any fupa!! Read more
items.author: alicia frierson

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars The item is trash.
items.body: This item was trash! The picture is not what was received. The item even has the notification frequently returned and I missed it when I purchased it. If the refund is not going to be returned, send me the product that is shown in the picture. Amazon please stop letting this seller get away with this. Read more
items.author: Vana Snow

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Horrible Odor
items.body: This dress is gorgeous and exactly like the picture and true to size. The material is quality and looks well made. My only complaint is the horrible odor, this dress has to be previously worn and not washed before returning it. Read more
items.author: Precious Rice

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVEEEEEE this Dress!!
items.body: This dress is simply stunning! The color is just as it is in the picture. This material is a silky, shiny satin and very soft. I love how the zipper is hidden and the ruching wins every time! I purchased for a formal 50th birthday and it was perfectâ€¦very elegant and received many compliments. Iâ€™m 5â€™5, 188lbs and ordered a large. My normal size is a medium, but I didnâ€™t want it to be tight. The large fit just right! Read more
items.author: Melody T.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Gold, Wine/Long Sleeve, Blue, Blue/Long Sleeve, Green/Long Sleeve, Black, Black/Long Sleeve, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
